byline.original: By RICHARD SEVERO and RALPH BLUMENTHAL

abstract: Theodore Bikel, versatile, multilingual actor and social activist, dies at age 91.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Bikel sang in 21 languages, from medieval Spanish to Zulu, in addition to his roles in theater, television and films.

headline.main: Theodore Bikel, Master of Versatility in Songs, Roles and Activism, Dies at 91
headline.print_headline: Theodore Bikel, Master of Versatility, Dies at 91

snippet: Mr. Bikel sang in 21 languages, from medieval Spanish to Zulu, in addition to his roles in theater, television and films.
